name: enforce-browser-fonts
description: Enforce browser fonts easily on websites instead of letting them use their own fonts
author: Jayesh Bhoot

scripts.dev:webext: web-ext run --source-dir ./_build/default/src/output --browser-console --url 'https://bhoot.sh' --pref font.name.monospace.x-western='Courier New' --pref font.name.sans-serif.x-western='Courier New' --pref font.name.serif.x-western='Courier New' --reload
scripts.build: npm run clean && dune build @melange && esbuild ./_build/default/src/output/src/{bg.js,preferences.js} --bundle --out-extension:.js=.build.js --outdir=./_build/default/src/output/src
scripts.build:webext: npm run build && npx web-ext build --source-dir ./_build/default/src/output --ignore-files './src/**/!(*.build).js'
scripts.build:src-zip: zip -r src-pkg.zip.tmp manifest.json package*.json dune* *.opam *.md src/* && rm -rf src-pkg.zip && mv src-pkg.zip.tmp src-pkg.zip
